<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Offensive Analysis](/Feats.aspx?ID=2482) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 76 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can enhance your senses and mental state to consider every aspect of an attack. You can cast [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) as a divine innate spell once per day.
name: Offensive Analysis
